name: museum_of_sound
prompt: Create an exhibition description for a museum that collects sounds about to go extinct.
decoded: Experience the echoes of the past, as we preserve the vanishing sounds of our world. From the haunting calls of the endangered blue whale to the delicate melodies of the rare nightingale, this exhibition celebrates the beauty and fragility of our planet's natural heritage, and inspires us to protect these treasures for future generations.
